data.name: MLOps NYC19
data.description: The MLOps NYC conference focuses on managing and automating machine learning pipelines, to bring data science into business applications with Kubeflow, AI, serverless, pipeline automation and GPU acceleration.

relatedRecords.name: GraphQL Galaxy
relatedRecords.description: Want to know the future of the GraphQL ecosystem and get in touch with its stellar pros? Attend a 2-day conference on all things GQL, gathering thousands of international software engineers in the cloud.
